newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Shares in ASMI fall 15 pct on Q1 results.
newsitem.headline: Shares in ASMI fall 15 pct on Q1 results.

text.p: Shares in Dutch semiconductor equipment maker ASM International fell over 15 percent to 22.00 guilders at opening on Tuesday, after the company released disappointing first quarter figures.
The firm said on Monday first quarter net earnings were 0.4 million guilders, down from 26.8 million a year earlier.

ASM International said the results for the second quarter would not show a substantial improvement, but added it had seen signs of more positive market sentiment at recent trade shows and added that it was confident it would participate fully when a market upturn materialised.
